page.title: 16Arts & Crafts,Ardington (1)
page.content:
The stables,dairy and farm buildings which had belonged to the Home Farm in Ardington now provide accomodation for 13 small craft industries.
The dairy now houses Ardington Pottery, where a wide range of highly fired stoneware and semi porcelain products are made by Mr & Mrs Les Owens.Their special interest lies in making imaginative sculptural pieces such as fairy tale castle lamps.Their export order to Japan won for them an "Incredible Export Award" when they sent "Ikebana" (Japanese flower arranging style) vases to be sold in Tokyo.They welcome special commissions to make commemorative pieces.
